MODULE.WhatsAppModule.statics.author: kindra.cl
MODULE.WhatsAppModule.statics.descriptio: A module to integrate WhatsApp messaging functionality.
MODULE.WhatsAppModule.settings.active.de: Whether the WhatsApp module is active
MODULE.WhatsAppModule.settings.accessTok: API access token for WhatsApp Business API
MODULE.WhatsAppModule.settings.allowPers: Whether to allow persistent changes to other modules to be triggered by WhatsApp messages
MODULE.WhatsAppModule.settings.allowModu: Whether to allow interaction with other modules in response to WhatsApp messages
MODULE.WhatsAppModule.settings.webhookTi: Timeout in milliseconds to aggregate webhook calls by userID before processing
MODULE.WhatsAppModule.settings.phoneNumb: The phone number ID associated with the WhatsApp Business API
